captionText: Good food is all the sweeter when shared with good friends.
author: Unknown

captionText: Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
author: Ernestine Ulmer

captionText: The only thing I like better than talking about food is eating.
author: John Walters

captionText: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

captionText: Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate.
author: Alan D. Wolfelt

captionText: Laughter is brightest in the place where the food is.
author: Irish Proverb

captionText: All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.
author: John Gunther

captionText: Food brings people together on many different levels. It's the nourishment of the soul and body; it's truly love.
author: Giada De Laurentiis

captionText: People who love to eat are always the best people.
author: Julia Child

captionText: First, we eat. Then, we do everything else.
author: M.F.K. Fisher

captionText: There is no love sincerer than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

captionText: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world, people get together to eat.
author: Guy Fieri

captionText: Food is not just eating energy. It's an experience.
author: Guy Fieri

captionText: Life is too short for self-hatred and celery sticks.
author: Marilyn Wann

captionText: People who love to eat are always the best people.
author: Julia Child

captionText: Food is not rational. Food is culture, habit, craving and identity.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

captionText: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
author: James Beard

captionText: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
author: Julia Child

captionText: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
author: David Chang

captionText: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
author: James Beard

captionText: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
author: Julia Child

captionText: Food, to me, is always about cooking and eating with those you love and care for.
author: David Chang

captionText: Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.
author: Harriet Van Horne
